price: 18. Isagoo leh: Ii dhiiba adoommaha Alle6. Waxaan anigu idiin ahay Rasuul aamin ah.
arabic: أَنۡ أَدُّوٓاْ إِلَيَّ عِبَادَ ٱللَّهِۖ إِنِّي لَكُمۡ رَسُولٌ أَمِينٞ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: an addū ilayya ʿibāda al-lahi innī lakum rasūlun amīnun
